damoore.leaderboard

Class LeaderboardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • damoore.leaderboard.LeaderboardController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(path="/leaderboard")
public class LeaderboardController
extends java.lang.Object
    A web controller class that maps weblinks after /leaderboard and adds or returns data from the leaderboard table via LeaderboardRepository.
    Author:
    damoore

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LeaderboardController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addPlayer(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Integer avgScore)
      This method is used to map the ability to add/update a player via a username to the leaderboard table to keep track of the rank of all players and will be called by the client via android volley.
      java.lang.Iterable<Leaderboard> getLeaderboard()
      This method is used to retrieve an interable list of all the players and their average score from the leaderboard table and will be called by the client via android volley.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LeaderboardController

        public LeaderboardController()

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayer

        @GetMapping(path="/add")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String addPlayer(@RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String name,
                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.Integer avgScore)
        This method is used to map the ability to add/update a player via a username to the leaderboard table to keep track of the rank of all players and will be called by the client via android volley.
        Parameters:
        name - String This is the username of the player to add/update to the leaderboard.
        avgScore - Integer This is the average score of the player, used to organize the leaderboard.
        Returns:
        A String confirmation message with the name and "added to the leaderboard".

      • getLeaderboard

        @GetMapping(path="/all")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Iterable<Leaderboard> getLeaderboard()
        This method is used to retrieve an interable list of all the players and their average score from the leaderboard table and will be called by the client via android volley.
        Returns:
        Iterable Leaderboard list of all the ranks, usernames, and average score of all players on the leaderboard table.
